price: Dan Allah akan menambah petunjuk kepada mereka yang telah mendapat petunjuk.  Dan amal-amal saleh yang kekal itu lebih baik pahalanya di sisi Tuhan-mu dan lebih baik kesudahannya.
arabic: وَيَزِيدُ ٱللَّهُ ٱلَّذِينَ ٱهۡتَدَوۡاْ هُدٗىۗ وَٱلۡبَٰقِيَٰتُ ٱلصَّٰلِحَٰتُ خَيۡرٌ عِندَ رَبِّكَ ثَوَابٗا وَخَيۡرٞ مَّرَدًّا

version.title: Indonesian Translation - King Fahd Complex
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Indonesian by approved Committee by Indonesian Ministry of Islamic Affairs. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.

meta.transliteration: wayazīdu al-lahu alladhīna ih'tadaw hudan wal-bāqiyātu al-ṣāliḥātu khayrun ʿinda rabbika thawāban wakhayrun maraddan
